The exercise of fishing rights is an exception to the measures taken by the Government of the Czech Republic and is therefore permitted.

Fishermen can fish for the entire permitted daily hunting period. Fishing is also exempt from the ban on free movement of persons at night, so the exercise of fishing rights is possible even between 21:00 and 4:59.

At the same time, the performance of the fishing guard function is not limited. Activities in the fishing area that cannot be postponed (e.g. restocking) are also allowed.

questions_answers.question: Is the sale of fish so-called "from the dam" allowed?
